input.sentences: two guys decided to do some yardwork .
they took a break and two new guys started working .
the wife decided shed do it herself .
output.sentences: The guys finally decided to finish the yardwork for mom.
It didn't take long after they started that the guys wanted a break.
Mom yelled at them to start working again.
One of the guys wife decided to help by getting a shovel from the shed.
They were not able to finish and will be back tomorrow.
